    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      char clientType
      Describes the type of client.
      static char FULL
      Initialization token 'f' means that the client is denied of connection because there is no available connection.
      static char LEFT 
      static char LEFT_COACH 
      int maxGrabSteps
      the maximal number of steps goalie allowed to grab the ball

      the ID number assigned to the client.
      static char RIGHT 
      static char RIGHT_COACH

      the client role (see class ConnectData).

      the server duration of the simulation step

      static char VIEWER_COACH

        public static final char FULL
        Initialization token 'f' means that the client is denied of connection because there is no available connection.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • clientType

        public char clientType
        Describes the type of client. If no connection available, 'f' is put here.

      • num

        public int num
        the ID number assigned to the client.

      • role

        public char role
        the client role (see class ConnectData).

      • simStepInSeconds

        public double simStepInSeconds
        the server duration of the simulation step

      • maxGrabSteps

        public int maxGrabSteps
        the maximal number of steps goalie allowed to grab the ball
